checkoutpage-desc: Allows up to N readers to simultaneously access the same page from the library.
checkoutpage-missing-params: Error: #checkout: parameters access_page, max_concurrent_users (integer >= 1), checkout_days (integer >= 1) are mandatory.
checkoutpage-not-allowed-for-this-user: Not available for checkout: only subscribers can access this page.
checkoutpage-not-enabled-for-page: This page can't be checked out, because checkout settings (max days, etc.) were not set for it.
checkoutpage-user-limit-reached: This page is temporarily unavailable (too many users are reading it).
